response.name: jobid
response.description: the ID of the latest async job acting on this object

response.name: id
response.description: the id of the router

response.name: account
response.description: the account associated with the router

response.name: created
response.description: the date and time the router was created

response.name: dns1
response.description: the first DNS for the router

response.name: dns2
response.description: the second DNS for the router

response.name: domain
response.description: the domain associated with the router

response.name: domainid
response.description: the domain ID associated with the router

response.name: gateway
response.description: the gateway for the router

response.name: guestipaddress
response.description: the guest IP address for the router

response.name: guestmacaddress
response.description: the guest MAC address for the router

response.name: guestnetmask
response.description: the guest netmask for the router

response.name: guestnetworkid
response.description: the ID of the corresponding guest network

response.name: hostid
response.description: the host ID for the router

response.name: hostname
response.description: the hostname for the router

response.name: isredundantrouter
response.description: if this router is an redundant virtual router

response.name: linklocalip
response.description: the link local IP address for the router

response.name: linklocalmacaddress
response.description: the link local MAC address for the router

response.name: linklocalnetmask
response.description: the link local netmask for the router

response.name: linklocalnetworkid
response.description: the ID of the corresponding link local network

response.name: name
response.description: the name of the router

response.name: networkdomain
response.description: the network domain for the router

response.name: podid
response.description: the Pod ID for the router

response.name: project
response.description: the project name of the address

response.name: projectid
response.description: the project id of the ipaddress

response.name: publicip
response.description: the public IP address for the router

response.name: publicmacaddress
response.description: the public MAC address for the router

response.name: publicnetmask
response.description: the public netmask for the router

response.name: publicnetworkid
response.description: the ID of the corresponding public network

response.name: redundantstate
response.description: the state of redundant virtual router

response.name: scriptsversion
response.description: the version of scripts

response.name: serviceofferingid
response.description: the ID of the service offering of the virtual machine

response.name: serviceofferingname
response.description: the name of the service offering of the virtual machine

response.name: state
response.description: the state of the router

response.name: templateid
response.description: the template ID for the router

response.name: templateversion
response.description: the version of template

response.name: zoneid
response.description: the Zone ID for the router

response.name: zonename
response.description: the Zone name for the router
